events.title: Wine & Canvas: Northern Glow (Paint & Sip)
events.description:
Create the Northern Glow — an aurora borealis scene with evergreen silhouettes — during this guided Paint & Sip at The Mockingbird on Mill Road.

Artist announcement coming soon; no experience needed. All supplies included (16×20 canvas).

Wine, beer, sangria, and no-proof drinks are available for purchase, along with our dinner-forward menu of boards, flatbreads, pressed sandwiches, and soup.

Tickets required; purchase through Wine & Canvas.

events.title: Galentine’s Day Floral Workshop with Meregold Creations
events.description: Join us at The Mockingbird for a relaxed, creative Galentine’s Day celebration featuring Meredith of Meregold Creations. Guests will enjoy a guided floral workshop with all supplies and instruction provided. Doors open at 11:00 AM so you can settle in, enjoy food and drinks, and sip mimosas before crafting begins at 12:00 PM. Food and drinks will be available for purchase throughout the event.
